text: captured on camera bullets fly off
passing cars as the attacker approaches
the Rana nightclub his victims had all
gone there to celebrate the new year
their loved ones have little to
celebrate now though this funeral was
for I an horik a tour guide who had
dropped off some tourists at the
nightclub so-called Islamic state has
claimed responsibility for the attack
which took more than 30 lives many of
them said to be foreigners those who
survived have a harrowing tale to tell
I like the salsa sauce unfettered he
fired one shot on its own so I thought
he could have been drunk but a few
seconds later we heard a machine gun
when I was shot I lay down I acted dead
so he didn't continue to shoot me is
leaders have called on their followers
to carry out attacks inside Turkey this
after turkey began a ground operation
against them as well as Kurdish groups
inside Syria four months ago in the last
two years of attacks in Turkey Kurdish
militants have mostly targeted military
forces and police while is is known to
target civilians the gunmen who opened
fire on New Year's Eve is still at large
eredivisie coracle Tamas this terror
terror cannot intimidate us we will
intimidate terror we will continue to
fight against it
our biggest insurance is to see our
people standing in solidarity and
supporting our resolve turkey has vowed
to fight terrorism again in 2016 almost
400 people lost their lives in terror
attacks this brutal start 2017 is an
ominous sign for the year to come as the
manhunt for the gunman continues Anissa
Qadri BBC news
